dialog_lines.line: This is example dialog text. Click "Continue" to advance.
By default, dialog shows up on the right side of this box, so the default speaker sprite should be on the right.
Take a look at the JSON/code to see how Utils can replace text, like controls based on platforms. Example: Move with <movement>
You can add custom buttons to the "End Buttons" array to allow for things like dialog decisions.
If no end buttons are assigned, a default will be used. Click "Continue" again to end the dialog.
